00035 @interface WebResponse : NSObject {
00036  NSUInteger code;
00037  NSMutableDictionary* headers;
00038  NSData* body;
00039 }
00040 @property (nonatomic, assign) NSUInteger code;
00041 @property (nonatomic, retain) NSMutableDictionary* headers;
00042 @property (nonatomic, retain) NSData* body;
00043 
00044 // body as UTF8 string
00045 @property (nonatomic, retain) NSString* bodyString;
